message.content:
cs.IR, cs.DL, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.SI. 

The paper discusses approaches to measuring cognitive distance between units, which is a concept related to information retrieval and natural language processing. Therefore, cs.IR (Information Retrieval), cs.DL (Digital Libraries), and cs.CL (Computation and Language) are all relevant sub-categories. The paper also discusses normalization and scale invariance, which are concepts related to machine learning and statistics, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) a possible sub-category as well. Finally, the paper discusses similarity-adapted publication vectors, which are a specific method for measuring cognitive distance, making cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) a possible sub-category.
